person.persName: Charles O. P. Smith (Adair County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Cabell in Adair County, Kentucky on July 14, 1838. Father of John W. Smith, Mary E. Smith, George W. Smith, and Andrew J. Smith. Married to Melissa Ann Gifford in Adair County on April 21, 1858. Father of Susan C. Smith. Blacksmith in White County, Illinois in 1850. Blacksmith in Adair County, Kentucky in 1860. Jailed for selling knives to enslaved people in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1862. Served as a private in the Thirteenth Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) from April 17, 1863 to January 10, 1865.
